posts.title: Running AI on My Mac: Why I Ditched ChatGPT for LM Studio
posts.excerpt: How I run powerful AI models locally on my M4 Pro MacBook with LM Studio. Privacy, speed, and vision models that can see images - all offline.
posts.author: Divanshu Chauhan

posts.title: PickMyClass: Never Miss Your Dream Class Again

posts.author: Divanshu Chauhan
